pages.text: Older and wiser, yet still malicious, Witches that have created and utilize far greater brews than their lesser kin. Their Hats are said to help make extra witch brews.

The hat of a Crone is a powerful object that when worn, gives a 25% chance of not using up a Potion, and a 10% chance of not using up a Brew. It also gives a chance of bottling, up to three extra brews if the wearer dons a Witch Robe, instead of two if the wearer had been don a regular Witch Hat instead.
